header_text: You are giving a presentation at a meeting and accidentally skip a section so have to start again. You are embarrassed by the mistake and worry what the audience thought of you. The audience probably thinks your delivery after starting over was awkward.

elements.text: Later that day, you realize that it is common to make mistakes when presenting. The audience probably thought your delivery after starting over was...

elements.name: You are giving a presentation at a meeting and accidentally skip a section so have to start again. You are embarrassed by the mistake and worry what the audience thought of you. The audience probably thinks your delivery after starting over was awkward._Social Situations_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
